prompts: Create a playful puppy Pokemon that loves running in the grass.
Imagine a small, furry Pokemon with a loyal and friendly personality.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a cute dog with a wagging tail.
Generate a Rock-type Pokemon with a rocky coat and bright blue eyes.
Make a Pokemon that can evolve into a fierce wolf-like creature.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and loves companionship.
Give me a Pokemon that has a mix of earthy tones and fluffy fur.
